en: Perfect Parry: Briefly touch a bullet at the moment of pressing and releasing the spacebar to trigger a perfect parry, deflecting faster and more threatening bullets.
zh: 完美反弹：在按下并释放空格键的瞬间轻触子弹，触发完美反弹，能够反弹更快速、更具威胁的子弹。

en: CONTROL
zh: 玩家控制

en: MOVE
zh: 移动

en: PARRY
zh: 反弹

en: AIM
zh: 瞄准

en: Hold SPACE
zh: 按住SPACE

en: MOVE MOUSE
zh: 移动鼠标

en: Healbird
zh: 疗翎

en: Bouncing Ball
zh: 皮球

en: Papper Airplane
zh: 纸飞机

en: Sapling
zh: 小树苗

en: Green Soup
zh: 碧绿魔汤

en: Guardian Shield
zh: 守护者

en: Mystic Familiar
zh: 秘术同伴

en: Bubble Gun
zh: 气泡枪

en: Shards Shoot
zh: 碎片射击

en: Reposition
zh: 重新定向

en: Wingman
zh: 小帮手

en: Resilient Heart
zh: 坚定之心

en: Feather: Gain a Healing Bird that follows the player after respawning, providing continuous health regeneration.
zh: 获得一只疗翎相伴随行，持续提供生命恢复。

en: Growth: The Healing Bird will provide increased healing.
zh: 成长：疗翎将提供增强的治疗效果。

en: Praise: The Healing Bird now enhances the player's stamina regeneration rate.
zh: 赞誉：疗翎现在能增强玩家的耐力回复速度

en: Support: The Healing Bird provides additional stamina regeneration.
zh: 相濡以沫：疗翎提供额外的耐力恢复

en: Care: During a Perfect Parry, the Healing Bird provides extra health and stamina regeneration.
zh: 关怀：	在完美格挡时，治愈之鸟将提供额外的生命与耐力恢复

en: Gift: Bullet flight speed increased by 25%.
zh: 初遇赠予：子弹飞行速度提高25%。

en: Roll and Roll: Bullets deal increased damage as their flight speed increases.
zh: 滚滚炸弹！：随着子弹飞行速度的增加，其造成的伤害也随之提高

en: Rebound: Bullets gain an additional bounce chance. When hitting a wall, they bounce instead of disappearing.
zh: 反弹：子弹获得额外的弹跳机会。当击中墙壁时，它们会弹跳而不是消失

en: Bounce and Bounce: Bullets gain three additional bounce chances. When hitting a wall, they bounce instead of disappearing.
zh: 弹弹炸弹！：子弹获得额外的弹跳机会。当击中墙壁时，它们会弹跳而不是消失

en: Magical Rebound Magic: Each bounce increases bullet damage by 20%.
zh: 超级反弹！：每次弹跳使子弹伤害增加20%

en: Simple Construction: Bullets' duration doubled.
zh: 化繁为简：子弹持续时间加倍

en: Aerodynamics: Longer bullet duration increases damage multiplier.
zh: 空气动力学：延长子弹持续时间会增加伤害倍增器。

en: Resistance: Bullets' base flight speed reduced by 30%.
zh: 空气阻力：子弹的基础飞行速度减少30%。

en: Creativity: Bullets no longer vanish automatically.
zh: 创造力：子弹不再自动消失

en: Stuck: Bullets' speed gradually decreases to 0 after firing.
zh: 黏滞：子弹射出后速度逐渐降至零

en: Rooted: Initial movement speed of incoming enemies reduced by 10%.
zh: 生根：来袭的敌人初始移动速度减少10%

en: Seedling: Every 10 enemies killed by the player, a healing orb is spawned at a specific location on the battlefield, restoring the player's health.
zh: 发芽：每当玩家杀死10个敌人时，在战场的特定位置生成一个治疗宝珠，恢复玩家的生命值

en: Rain: When the player kills 100 enemies (60 in the testing version), the Sapling transforms into a Wardenwood, granting the player a legendary skill selection opportunity.
zh: 滋养：当玩家杀死100个敌人，树苗将转变为守护林，为玩家提供传奇技能选择机会。

en: Thorns: Sapling: Player's stamina consumption increased by 30%, immediately providing the Sapling with 20 additional enemy kill counts. Wardenwood: Deals 0.2 damage per second to all enemies on the battlefield.
zh: 繁盛：树苗状态下，玩家的耐力消耗增加30%，立即为树苗增加20个额外的敌人击杀计数。守护林状态下，对战场上所有敌人每秒造成0.2点伤害

en: Wild Growth: Sapling: Player's stamina increased by 30%, immediately providing the Sapling with 40 additional enemy kill counts. Wardenwood: Any damage dealt by the player applies a 30% slow effect to enemies and grants a slow debuff marker.
zh: 野蛮生长：树苗状态下，玩家的耐力增加30%，立即为树苗增加40个额外的敌人击杀计数。守护林状态下，玩家造成的任何伤害都会对敌人施加30%的减速效果，并授予减速debuff标记。

en: Witch's Exclusive Recipe: One chapter from the witch's five magic potion recipes, detailing the ingredients and steps to make the Green Soup. Perhaps collecting all the magic potion recipes will yield different results.
zh: 女巫专属食谱：从女巫的五种魔法药水配方中选取一章，详细介绍了制作碧绿魔汤的配料和步骤。也许收集所有的魔法药水配方会产生不同的结果

en: Red Mushroom and Green Soup: Enemies receive a stack of Poison debuff upon taking any form of damage (Poison: Enemies lose one health point per second per stack of poison; boss maximum stack limit is 50 layers).
zh: 绯红蘑菇和碧绿魔汤：敌人在受到任何形式的伤害后会获得一层中毒debuff（中毒：敌人每秒失去一个生命点，每层中毒的最大堆叠限制为50层）

en: Foul Odor: Player gains a Poisonous Aura; enemies within the aura suffer 0.5 damage per second. Enemies within the aura suffer Poison debuff triggering 30% faster.
zh: 女巫之息：玩家获得剧毒光环；光环内的敌人每秒受到0.5点伤害。光环内的敌人中毒debuff触发速度提高30%

en: Extra Ingredients!: Increased Poisonous Aura activation frequency by 5% when picking up items (maximum increase is 50%).
zh: 超级加倍：每捡起一个物品增加5%的剧毒光环激活频率（最大增幅为50%）

en: Keep Your Distance from That Pot: Poisonous Aura now moves to the player's cursor position instead of staying on the player.
zh: 还是离它远点吧：剧毒光环现在会跟随玩家鼠标位置移动，而不是停留在玩家身上。

en: Vigilant Shield: Gain a blue shield token slot that can block one attack. Gain one shield token upon precise parry.
zh: 警戒之盾：获得一个蓝色的盾牌令牌槽，可抵挡一次攻击。精确招架时获得一个盾牌令牌

en: Sanctuary Shield: All blue shield tokens turn yellow. Health regeneration speed increases when holding a shield token.
zh: 庇护之盾：所有蓝色盾牌令牌变为黄色。持有盾牌令牌时，生命恢复速度增加

en: Guardian Aegis: All yellow shield tokens turn red. Automatically triggers a perfect parry upon taking damage while holding a shield token.
zh: 守护者神盾：所有黄色盾牌令牌变为红色。持有盾牌令牌时受到攻击自动触发完美招架

en: Arcane Familiar: Gain a familiar that orbits the player and periodically fires regular bullets.
zh: 奥术使魔：获得一个环绕玩家的使魔，周期性地发射普通子弹。

en: Enchanted Companion: Reduce the familiar's attack interval.
zh: 魔法进阶：减少使魔的攻击间隔

en: Sorcerous Ally: Increase the familiar's bullet damage.
zh: 巫术进阶：提高使魔子弹的伤害

en: Warded Guardian: The familiar generates a shield periodically, which destroys bullets upon contact.
zh: 守护结界：使魔周期性地生成一个护盾，接触到子弹时可以免疫子弹的伤害。

en: Runebound Familiar: Familiar's bullets are aimed at the player's mouse direction.
zh: 精准使魔：使魔周期性地生成一个护盾，接触到子弹时可以免疫子弹的伤害。

en: Warding Sentinel: If the player does not have a shield token slot, the drone provides one. Gain a shield indicator token when the drone generates a shield.
zh: 守护哨兵：如果玩家没有盾牌令牌槽，无人机将提供一个。当无人机生成护盾时，获得一个盾牌指示令牌。

en: Glyphic Familiar: The drone inherits the player's bullet effects.
zh: 符文使魔：无人机继承玩家的子弹效果

en: Fondness: Generates a magic bubble at the mouse position when the player deflects bullets.
zh: 爱不释手：当玩家偏转子弹时，在鼠标位置生成一个魔法泡泡对敌人造成伤害

en: Really Good At It: Bubbles from perfect parries are larger and deal more damage.
zh: 精通其中：来自完美招架的泡泡更大，造成的伤害也更高

en: Breeze: Generated bubbles automatically track nearby enemies.
zh: 和煦微风：生成的泡泡会自动追踪附近的敌人

en: Resilient Bubbles: Bubbles burst upon contact with bullets, destroying the bullets.
zh: 坚韧泡泡：泡泡在接触子弹时爆炸，摧毁子弹

en: Sticky Bubble Solution: Enemies hit by bubbles are slowed to 0 speed for 3 seconds.
zh: 粘稠泡泡溶液：被泡泡击中的敌人速度减慢至0，持续3秒钟

en: Bubble Burst Magic: Bubbles explode into a barrage of regular bullets when they burst.
zh: 泡泡爆炸魔法：泡泡爆炸时会爆发出一阵普通子弹

en: Shard Burst: Bullets now split into 3 fragments, dealing 30% of the original damage.
zh: 碎片爆破：子弹现在分裂为3个碎片，每个碎片造成原始伤害的30%。

en: Increased Shards: Bullets now split into 5 fragments.
zh: 增强碎片：子弹现在分裂为5个碎片

en: Massive Shards: Bullets now split into 9 fragments.
zh: 碎片雨：子弹现在分裂为9个碎片

en: Repositioning: Bullets will fly towards the nearest enemy unit after traveling for a while.
zh: 重定位：子弹在飞行一段时间后会朝最近的敌人单位飞去

en: Accelerated Repositioning: Bullets' flight speed increases by 50% after repositioning.
zh: 加速：子弹在重新定位后的飞行速度提高50%

en: High-speed Repositioning: Bullets' flight speed increases by 200% after repositioning.
zh: 飞驰子弹：子弹在重新定位后的飞行速度提高200%

en: Protection!: Your wing man now blocks bullets for you and sends them back.
zh: 防御立场：获得一个小帮手，可以为你挡住子弹，并将它们反弹回去。

en: Assistant!: Your wing man now fires bullets alongside the player.
zh: 好兄弟：小帮手现在会与玩家一同射击子弹

en: Synchronization!: Your wing man now inherits the player's bullet type.
zh: 心有灵犀：小帮手现在继承了玩家的子弹类型

en: Steadfast Grace: Players will lose their health bar and instead gain three red hearts. When damaged, the player loses one heart, and gains one heart upon perfect parry.
zh: 玻璃心：玩家将失去他们的生命条，改为获得三颗红心。当受到伤害时，玩家会失去一颗心，而在完美招架时会获得一颗心。

en: Conservative Strategy: Players gain a fourth red heart.
zh: 保守策略：玩家获得第四颗红心

en: Easygoing: Players regain all hearts upon a perfect parry.
zh: 小菜一碟：玩家在完成一次完美招架后恢复所有心

en: Start
zh: 开始游戏

en: Control
zh: 控制

en: Credit
zh: 制作人员

en: REPLAY
zh: 重新开始

en: MAIN MENU
zh: 主菜单

en: Exit
zh: 退出游戏

en: Next Level:
zh: 下一级：

en: The Killer is
zh: 死亡原因：

en: congratulation!!
zh: 通关成功！！
